1.title: AKJP: Cape Town
1.plot: In the premiere episode of ETHETICS (ethics+aesthetics), we travel to Cape Town, South Africa to view the latest collection from AKJP, one of South Africa's most innovative brands. The collection is modeled in the factory where the collection was made, while designer Keith Henning shares a behind-the-scenes look at his ethical fashion brand.

2.title: MDINGI COUTTS: Cape Town
2.plot: The second episode of Ethetics showcases looks from the Lukyaho Mdinigi and Nicholas Coutts A/W16 Tactile Collection in three South African landscapes, from a barren desert to a lush mountainside on models Gandhi Mukiza and Yannick Konan.
